TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Mauritania, title = Mauritania, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mauritania} }

S.FORM: Mauritania Itini i 20 00 N, 12 00 W, no Afilika ko Mauritania. Polong no sekalay i 1,030,700 sq km "saka 29 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 1,030,700 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 0 sq km " Polong i 3,677,293 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 38.50%, Malo no kilakilangan a sera 0.20%, malo no roma to a sera 61.30%. siyoto O Nouakchott ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakacecay ko safaw 28 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz, patirengan a romi'ad i 2009 a miheca saka 8 folad saka 5 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA 外交部

Maoritania Itini i 20 00 N, 12 00 W, no Afilika ko Maoritania. Polong no sekalay i 1,030,700 sq km "saka 29 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 1,030,700 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 0 sq km " Polong i 3,677,293 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 38.50%, Malo no kilakilangan a sera 0.20%, malo no roma to a sera 61.30%. siyoto O Nooakchott ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakacecay ko safaw 28 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Mohamed Oold Abdel Aziz, patirengan a romi'ad i 2009 a miheca saka 8 folad saka 5 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA 外交部
